oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effect of Trace Mineral Level and Source on Cow/Calf Performance and Immune Response
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schugel, I. M.
Johnson, A. B.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Zinc
copper
manganese
trace mineral level
liver trace mineral status
immune response
reproduction
growth
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Zinc, copper and manganese are needed for proper production and immune response in the cow/calf herd. A series of experiments were conducted over a period of three years throughout the High Plains region evaluating the role of trace mineral level and source on cow and calf liver trace mineral status, immune response, reproduction parameters and growth.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1996; 188
